title: Energy forms - objects 1 and 2 connected by spring

content.prompt: For the system consisting of only Block 1 , what forms of mechanical energy are present in the system and what reasoning supports the claim?

choices.label: Kinetic energy only because Block 1 is moving relative to Block 2.
Kinetic energy only because Block 1 is in motion but has no internal parts that can interact with each other.
Kinetic energy and elastic potential energy because both blocks are in motion and the spring length is changing.
Kinetic energy and elastic potential energy because Block 1 is in motion and the spring exerts an external force on it.

skill.text: 3.C: Justify or support a claim using evidence from experimental data, physical representations, or physical principles or laws.
